keyword: how many calories is in a coors light
title: How Many Calories in a Coors Light?
meta_description: Learn how many calories is in a Coors Light, including carbs, protein, sodium, and full nutrition breakdown per serving.
h1: How Many Calories in a Coors Light?
assumptions: Standard 12 fl oz (355 ml) serving of Coors Light American light lager beer, chilled, no additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by serving size, brewing batch, and container; alcohol content affects totals. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard Coors Light has about 102 calories and 5 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: 16 fl oz pint serving (vs. 12 fl oz)

faqs.q: How many calories is in a Coors Light bottle?
faqs.a: About 102 calories in a standard 12 fl oz serving.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in Coors Light?
faqs.a: Approximately 5 g of carbohydrates per 12 fl oz serving.

faqs.q: Does Coors Light have protein or fat?
faqs.a: It has about 0.9 g protein and 0 g fat per serving.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in a Coors Light?
faqs.a: Around 10 mg of sodium per 12 fl oz serving.

faqs.q: Is Coors Light low calorie compared to regular beer?
faqs.a: Yes, at 102 kcal, it's lower than many regular beers (e.g., 150+ kcal).
